fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may stalk someone at night, scaring away anyone that visits them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a straw coat that grants you Basic defense until you are attacked.
- You will know who your target visits.
- You cannot be roleblocked.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see Town lose the game.
